extendedInfo.description: Do you want to feel happier than you already are? Do you find that most self-help books are too long, detailed, embarrassing or complicated?The simple solution is these 101 quick, easy and free happiness ways to make you feel happy right now. Theyâll help you get the big picture on how you can feel happier, and from there you can start to add more ideas of your own. Make sure you get your daily dose of happiness, because lifeâs too short to be miserable and there are infinite ways to feel happy, itâs just a case of finding them and using them.There is a lot of self-help and personal development books to fill a couple of tea chests, and many of you have read some of them in search of happiness and fulfillment. Hereâs the most important stuff you need to do to make you feel happier, all compressed into one quick list.If you havenât already had your happy fix today, or if you want to feel even happier, try these 101 quick, simple ideas, but maybe not all on the same day.Tags: what is happiness, the best happy quotes, happiness quotes, quotes about happiness, happy life quotes, greatest positive psychology quotations, live life quotes, inspiring quotes, quotes on happy, be happy quotes, quotes to be happy sayings, quotes about happiness, positive thinking, quotes inspirational, famous inspiration tips, motivational quotes, motivation.

reviews.title: Simple but effective
reviews.comment: It is thought provoking and simple. I love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it. I just read through it and I already feel happier!(: Plus, it\'s simple, easy to use,  and pretty straight forward.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 101 ways to be happy!
reviews.comment: Sometimes you just need some reminders to help redirect yourself and make you smile and remember that there is a tomorrow and that it will get better and this app speeds the process up. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 stars for making me smile
reviews.comment: Well done for the effort. Would appreciate if you continue to evolve the app and not just stop here :) thanks
reviews.author: Deborah Bezzina

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: it\'s awesome, i think it\'s great application, each n every word made me happy ...... luv urself luv sumone nd be happy luv
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the smiley face!
reviews.comment: Appreciate the simplicity in the reminders. A practical way to keep a healthy track on where my mind can travel in a day!
reviews.author: Selina Williamson

reviews.title: Depressing?
reviews.comment: This app only made me more sad and there were some good things but I ended up crying with no friends cuz I spent a day alone. Overall this isn\'t very good so don\'t get it fuzzy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This app totally works I would recommend it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 3stars
reviews.comment: i liked d app...its good if u have got bored from your daily routine it will help you its really a gud app....
reviews.author: suzi dhillon

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Try this app out its made me so happy! :-)
reviews.author: TheAwsome Steph

reviews.comment: Aww, this is wonderful! A lot of the things we do in life we take for granted, and this shows how happy those very simple things can make us.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: How to be happy
reviews.comment: I have tried some of the tips mentioned and they acctually did work in making me feel happy.We are alive and we should always make the choice to be happy no matter what!!!! And stop depending on others for our own happiness......peace out.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: How to be happy
reviews.comment: This app reminds me to slow down enjoy and experience life. Life can be as easy or difficult as one chooses.
reviews.author: Jim Chapman

reviews.comment: it\'s cute, and fills you up with a positive perspective. one tip a day makes miracles :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This actually works!
reviews.comment: This app is really helpful and good if you\'re one of those who really wanna stay happy. The first way is  \"smile\" and I\'m sure most of the people will actually smile reading it. This  is a great app.         There should be an app to track happiness too which will make you smile and give true reasons to make you smile.  Keep Smiling! Cheers :)
reviews.author: Prashanti Shivam

reviews.title: Just what I needed for 2013!
reviews.comment: I was having a pretty crappy outlook for the new year but as simple as this app may be, it\'s exactly what I needed! Simplicity is underrated and sometimes getting back to the basics is just what the human spirit needs to replenish what it has lost. I love this app! Thank you for possibly making 2013 the best year of this girl\'s life!!
reviews.author: Cynthia Mansco

reviews.title: Very helpful!
reviews.comment: This app helped me to acknowledge all the great things in life and explore all the things I didn\'t even know were there. Great self-esteem booster!
reviews.author: maddie camille

reviews.title: 101 Ways to be happy
reviews.comment: Awesome!! Thank you for this app; it totally deserves 5 stars. I read through the whole thing as soon as I downloaded it and it made me feel really, really good. :) I\'ve been depressed lately and I\'m pregnant so my emotions have been going crazy and I swear this calmed me down so...THANK YOU!! I would love to see more stuff like this :)
reviews.author: Victoria Harden

reviews.comment: It make me feel happy XD
